title: 2011 National Religious Broadcasters Convention (PHOTOS)
text:
Go
2011 National Religious Broadcasters Convention (PHOTOS)
2011 National Religious Broadcasters Convention (PHOTOS)
| Sunday, February 27, 2011
Related
Day 1:
Christian music artist Nicole C. Mullen performs on the opening day of the 2011 National Religious Broadcasters Convention on Saturday, February 26, 2011, in Nashville, Tenn. | (Photo: The Christian Post)
(Photo: The Christian Post)
Voddie Baucham, pastor of Grace Family Baptist Church in Spring, Texas, challenges Christian broadcasters at the 2011 National Religious Broadcasters convention to not equate the homosexual agenda with the civil rights movmement on Saturday, February 26, 2011, in Nashville, Tenn. | (Photo: The Christian Post)
Jay Sekulow, chief counsel of the American Center for Law and Justice, gives updates on how his legal group is defending religious freedom around the world on Saturday, February 26, 2011, in Nashville, Tenn. | (Photo: The Christian Post)
